description: '''Martial industrial''' (also called '''military pop'''{{citation needed|date=March 2023}}) is a syncretic offshoot of [[industrial music]] characterized by [[Noise music|noise]], [[dark ambient]] atmospheres, [[neofolk]] melodies, [[dark wave]] tunes and [[Neoclassicism (music)|neoclassical]] orchestrations as well as the incorporation of audio from [[Martial music|military marches]], historical speeches and political, [[apolitical]] or [[metapolitical]] lyrics. Unlike other [[post-industrial music|post-industrial]] genres, martial industrial is typically interested more in a particular worldview or philosophy than pure experimentalism.
